HTMLInputElementAutocomplete.summary: The autocomplete property of the interface indicates whether the value of the control can be automatically completed by the browser. It reflects the {{htmlelement("input")}} element's autocomplete attribute.

remarks.para:
-input
-
-HTML autocomplete attribute
-ARIA aria-autocomplete attribute
-Turning off autocompletion

HTMLInputElementAutocomplete.value: A string; the value of the autocomplete attribute ("on", "off", a <token-list>), or the empty string "" if unspecified.
